mapper.select:
SELECT SignRecord_ID, SignRecord_CreateTime, SignRecord_Day, SignRecord_Month, SignRecord_Year, SignRecord_UserID, SignRecord_Status, SignRecord_Deleted, SignRecord_Memo
SignRecord_Status=1
and SignRecord_ID = #{ID}
order by SignRecord_CreateTime desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wtb_SignRecord ( SignRecord_ID, SignRecord_CreateTime, SignRecord_Day, SignRecord_Month, SignRecord_Year, SignRecord_UserID, SignRecord_Status, SignRecord_Deleted, SignRecord_Memo ) VALUES ( #{ID}, now(), #{Day}, #{Month},#{Year},#{UserID},#{Status} ,#{Deleted},#{Memo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wtb_SignRecord SET SignRecord_Day=#{Day}, SignRecord_Month=#{Month}, SignRecord_Year=#{Year}, SignRecord_UserID=#{UserID}, SignRecord_Status=#{Status}, SignRecord_Deleted=#{Deleted}, SignRecord_Memo=#{Memo} where SignRecord_ID = #{ID}
